Pull Request means you want to contribute code, not report issues.  You could try to find help from  kylin mailer: dev@kylin.apache.org . Suggest closing the Pull Request.

There's install guide for those very clear, please visit following page for more detail:
http://kylin.apache.org/docs15/install/index.html
http://kylin.apache.org/docs15/install/hadoop_env.html

Any other issue, please discuss in mailing list.
Thanks.
Merged into 'document' branch. Please close this PR.
@liyang-gmt8 @shaofengshi ,Can you help me review it?

I've added some kylin properties to support hive sql and mapreduce job running on a remote HDInsight cluster.
@shaofengshi, @etherge pls help review it, thx.

hi Delu, seems the changes are for constructing a hadoop "Configuration" object, no other extra change. If so, I guess configure these param/values in hdfs-site.xml or core-site.xml will take effective, as Kylin load the hadoop configurations from the host machine's classpath. Could you check that? 

We were able to run Kylin on AWS EMR with S3 as the hive source; That only need change the xml conf files, no Java code change. I think Azure is the similar.

@shaofengshi, yes, the changes are for hadoop configuration. If kylin runs on one hadoop-azure cluster, that is hive and mapreduce running on same cluster with hbase, there'll be no hadoop configuration change needed. 

But in my scenairo, kylin is deployed on Hbase cluster, while running hive sql/mapreduce job on a remote hadoop cluster. So I've added these property keys in kylin.property, then we can init a custom hadoop configuration object in runtime, and it'll have no influence on the underline DFS of Hbase.

My way to solve it is a bit tricky, it's great if there's a better way to solve it : )

And, I have to admit that this is not a general feature change, it's ok not to merge the changes into master, I can keep it in my private branch.

Hi Delu,

I get it, thank you; 

Kylin already supports the read/write separated deployment: one cluster for Hive+Hadoop (write), the other (dedicated) cluster for HBase (read only); But the recommended deployment topologic is a little different with yours: it suggests running Kylin on a client machine whose HDFS/Hadoop/MR/Hive configurations point to the Hive cluster, but make the HBase configuration (hbase-site.xml) points to the HBase cluster. After that, in conf/kylin.properties, configure "kylin.hbase.cluster.fs" pointing to the NN of HBase; With this configuration, Kylin will automatically transfer the cube file to HBase cluster after building. 

This blog illustarte this: https://kylin.apache.org/blog/2016/06/10/standalone-hbase-cluster/

Suggest you have a check; if it can solve your issue without any code change, that would be great!
Hi @xwhfcenter , Kylin use JIRA as issue tracking system. Your report has been filed as https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KYLIN-2251.

Hi @joeswingle , thanks for the patch. Could you generate a patch for this change? Kylin has patch and review process, not PR and merge process. To learn more: http://kylin.apache.org/development/howto_contribute.html
Thank you for the PR. Could you follow the patch process, with Kylin code style? please check: http://kylin.apache.org/development/howto_contribute.html

Could you open a JIRA, and attach the patch into that JIRA?
One more thing, please take care the code format, I found some mismatch in your patch, such as space around "=".

hello study010, thanks for the patch; as an Apache project, Kylin accept the contributions with a JIRA and then attaching the git patch file in it. Thanks for joining the community! See: https://kylin.apache.org/development/howto_contribute.html

hello shuiqing301, thanks for the patch; as an Apache project, Kylin accepts the contributions with a JIRA and then attaching the git patch file to it. Thanks for joining the community! See: https://kylin.apache.org/development/howto_contribute.html
Thank you. @shaofengshi I am promoting Kylin actively and our project has used it. I will actively participate in Kylin's open source!
Interrupt 的功能已经被其它的exception所覆盖了，例如KylinTimeoutException。这里的interrupt的逻辑是在sql中如果有任何exception，就会interrupt掉当前的query
这些改动很少有UT覆盖，请增加相应的测试用例以提高代码的UT覆盖率，谢谢！

Thanks for your interests. For questions, please discuss in the mailing list.
Refer to: http://kylin.apache.org/community/
